"Both women are equally memorable in a play that marries the stylized drama of Southern Gothic with the wit of a comedy of manners...It's easy to sink into the play, which passes swiftly...Sullivan commands a fluid ensemble performance, stretching great drama out of heated arguments and pregnant pauses...In 2017, 'The Little Foxes' feels a little bit like elderberry wine and tea cakes in the afternoonâ€”a superfluous indulgence, but an intoxicating, transportive treat, nonetheless."
